Tooltip: Take a screenshot of the primary window.

Arguments.Name: in_str_FolderPath
Arguments.Tooltip: The folder to save the screenshot to. If File Path is not provided, a generic file name is generated and saved to this folder.

Arguments.Name: in_str_Prefix
Arguments.Tooltip: The prefix to append to the file name of the screenshot. Use if not providing complete file path.

Arguments.Name: in_str_FilePath
Arguments.Tooltip: An overload in case you want to provide the file name of the screenshot. Leave empty to use generic file name.

Arguments.Name: Output
Arguments.Tooltip: The file path of the screenshot taken.
